import { registerUser } from "../services/internalApiService" import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import './styles/Register.css' const Register = () => { const [username, setUsername] = useState("") const [password, setPassword] = useState("") const [error, setError] = useState([]) const navigate = useNavigate() const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() let newUser = { username: username, password: password } registerUser(newUser) .then(data => navigate('/login')) .catch(err => { const errRes = err.response.data.error.message setError(errRes) }) } return ( <>

Register

) }
setUsername(e.target.value)} value={username} />
setPassword(e.target.value)} value={password} />

) } export default Register
